item.title: Modern C++ Design Pattern/Chatper 8. 컴포지트
item.description: Composite Pattern How to announce the object has multiple composite attributes? It is not easy. Properties based on array. class Creature { int strength, agility, intelligence; public: int get_stringth() const { return strength; } void set_strength(int strength) { Creture::strength = strength; } // Other getter/setter.... int sum() const { return strength + agility + intelligence; } double average() const { return sum() / 3.0; } int max() const { return ::max(::max(strength, agility), intelligence); } }; It is not pretty.
